name: FALL IN LOVE2
description: IntroductionThe main goal of the game is to find all the differences between the 2 illustrations. When you find them, you only need to use the mouse to click to eliminate the differences. When all are found, you can browse to the complete illustration content and unlock it into your own book. When you unlock all the book content, you can clear the level!Illustration introductionThe illustrations used in the game are all beautiful anime girls with their own characteristics, including a pure female nurse, a sexy car model, a seductive succubus, a mature young woman... There are as many as 31 levels in the game. Come and experience it!
